Key.value: The character deals 1% more damage for each positive effect lasting more than a minute that is active on them, up to a maximum of 5%.
The character deals 1% more damage for each ability used within the last 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 5%.
After entering combat, the character gains +5% damage for 10 seconds.
When dealing damage with an ability to more than one target, damage is increased by 2% for each additional target hit. Up to 5 targets. Lasts for 10 seconds.
The character deals 8% more damage when their health is above 90%.
After killing an enemy, the character deals 8% more damage for 10 seconds.
The character deals 10% more damage to targets with health below 20%.
If the character takes damage exceeding 30% of their maximum health within 3 seconds, they deal 10% more damage. The effect lasts for 10 seconds.
Damage-dealing abilities reduce the effectiveness of healing by 40% for 3 seconds.
Every 2.5 seconds the character spends in combat, they gain 1% attack power or spell power (adaptive) (max 10%).
The character gains additional attack power or spell power (adaptive) equal to 1.5% of their maximum health or mana (adaptive).
For each enemy killed, the character gains 0.2% (max 10%) attack power or spell power (adaptive). 50% of stacks are lost upon death.
When the character has less than 50% health, he receives 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist.
After entering combat, the hero will reflect 20% damage of next 5 incoming auto-attacks.
Every 2 seconds out of combat, the player gains 1 Armor and Magic Resist up to 10 stacks. Upon taking damage, the player loses 1 stack.
Taking magic damage grants a magical shield for 10% characters maximum health. Taking physical damage grants a physical shield for 10% characters maximum health. Cooldown: 3 minute.
Armor and Magic Resist are increased by 5 for each ally character nearby (20 meters) the character. Maximum of 3 stacks.
For each enemy nearby (20m), the character gains 3 Armor and 3 Magic Resist, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.
All critical strikes dealt to the character have a reduced critical damage multiplier of 50%.
After being critically struck, the character gains a buff that amplifies any incoming healing by 5% (max 30%). The effect lasts for 5 seconds.
After being critically hit by an enemy, the character cannot receive critical hits for the next 5 seconds.
Reduces the duration of crowd control effects on the character by 30%
For each enemy killed, the character gains 0.2% (max 15%) maximum health. All stacks are lost upon death.
Reduces the cooldown of abilities by 10% when the character's health drops below 50%.
Increases the player's resource regeneration by 5% for each ability that is on cooldown.
Reduces resource cost of abilities by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of all abilities by 20%.
After killing an enemy, abilities on cooldown are reduced by 1 second.
If the character's ability is interrupted, their next ability within 6 seconds will cost 0 resource.
Ability interruption effects have a 75% reduced duration on the character.
10% of incoming damage is redirected to mana instead of health.
Gain a shield equal to 10% of maximum mana. The shield recharges after 10 seconds out of combat.
Damage dealing abilities restores 2% of the damage dealt as mana.
If the character remains stationary for 3 seconds, their abilities damage is enhanced by 15%.
Increases physical or magical critical strike chance (adaptive) by 1% every 10 seconds outside of combat. Maximum 50%. Works on first damage.
After using a skill, the next auto-attack has an increased physical critical strike chance by 10%. Cooldown 2.5 seconds.
After landing a critical strike, the character gains 10% physical or magical critical strike chance (adaptive) for 5 seconds.
Killing an enemy increases flat armor penetration or magic penetration (adaptive) by 10 for 10 seconds.
The character gains a stacking buff when their ability deal damage to an enemy, granting 1 flat armor or magic penetration (adaptive) per stack (up to 10 stacks). Stacks last for 7 seconds.
If the character deals critical damage to a target affected by their periodic damage effect, the next 3 ticks of that effect will also deal critical damage.

When the character attacks an enemy without allies nearby, they gain 10% armor or magic penetration (adaptive) and deal an additional 50% physical or magical critical damage power against this enemy (adaptive) for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 20 seconds.
The character gains 10% armor penetration or magic penetration (adaptive) and deals 50% additional physical or magical critical damage power (adaptive) to enemies when attacking them from behind.

When the character disappears using camouflage or invisibility from the enemy's sight for 2 seconds during combat, their next ability or auto-attack gains an additional 30% physical or magical critical strike chance (adaptive).
The character can notice every stealth activation within a 30-meter radius. Cooldown 30 seconds
If the character attacks an enemy with maximum health greater than the character's own (2x for monsters), the enemy receives 10% increased damage from the character.
When landing a critical strike, the character deals an additional 30% of the damage to surrounding enemies within 2.5 meters.
When the character's health drops below 50%, their attack speed is increased by 10%.
Auto-attacks against the same target increase the character's attack speed by 1% (stacking up to 10 times).The effect lasts for 3 seconds or fails if the character changes target.
For 10 seconds after entering combat, the character gains 10% attack speed for 10 seconds.
Increases movement speed by 7% for 5 seconds after using dash abilities.
After suffering movement-impairing effects, the character's movement speed is increased by 7% for 5 seconds.
Gain immunity to movement-impairing effects for 2 second after using a dash ability.
Grants the character a stacking 1% movement speed buff for every 10 seconds out of combat, up to a maximum of 5%.
The character can sense wounded targets below 30% health within a large radius. Does not sense targets within a 20-meter radius. Activates once every 3 minutes.
If the character's health drops below 15%, all immobilization effects are removed. Cooldown is 60 seconds.
If the character takes damage exceeding 30% of their maximum health within 3 seconds, their attack speed increases by 20% for 10 seconds.
If the character attacks an enemy with maximum health greater than the character's own (2x for monsters), the character gains a 15% increase in attack speed against this target.
For each enemy killed, the character gains 0.2% (max 10%) attack speed. 50% of stacks are lost upon death.
Increases healing and shielding effectiveness by 10% when the character's mana is above 80%.
If the character has not used any healing or shielding abilities for 10 seconds, their next healing or shielding ability will be 3% stronger up to 15%.
Increases healing and shielding by 10%, but reduces damage by 10%.
Healing a target also heals the character for 10% of the amount healed
Critical healing applies a healing-over-time effect to a target for 10 seconds, equivalent to 10% of the amount healed
Critical healing applies a shield to a target for 10 seconds, equivalent to 10% of the amount healed.
When removing a negative effect, restores 10% of the missing health to the target over 5 seconds.
Increases healing and shielding by 4% for every unique target healed or shielded within the last 10 seconds (max 12%).
Remove a negative effect from a nearby ally with the lowest health. Cooldown 60 seconds.
The duration of shields applied by the hero is doubled.
20% of the hero's overhealing becomes a shield (maximum shield strength is equal to 10% of the target's maximum health) for 10 seconds.
The player's shield-applying abilities now have 2 charges.
For each ability used by the character, allies, or enemies within a radius of 10 meters, the character gains charges for 5 seconds. At 10 charges, the next ability will deal 20% more damage.
Every third basic attack deals an additional 3% of the target's current health as true damage.
The character gains an additional 1% attack power or spell power (adaptive) for every 3% of their missing health.
Auto-attack or targeted ability slows down the target.
Move speed: -30% Duration: 3 sec Cooldown: 15 sec
The less your Health, the more outgoing Physical damage.
Effects that deal periodic damage do not apply periodic damage. Instead, they deal 130% of the total damage to the target when the effect duration ends.
After using an ability, reduce the remaining cooldown on your other abilities by 1 second.

Each character's damaging ability used on the same target increases the damage of the next ability used on that same target by 5%. The effect stacks up to 5 times and lasts for 7 seconds. If an ability is used on a different target, the buff expires.
Increase of Abilities Damage for longer Cooldown reduction.
Using of ability applies the Effect that increases all Damage.

Non-critical auto-attacks grant a buff that increases the chance of physical or magical critical strike (adaptive) by 1% for 5 seconds, which are consumed upon landing a critical strike. The effect can stack up to 100%.
When the character scores a critical hit, they gain a stack of Blade Master. At 5 stacks, their next ability deals 20% increased damage and consumes all stacks.
Enemy can not use dash abilities for 3 seconds after player deals damage that exceeds 30% of the enemy's maximum health within 5 seconds.
Increase of all damage to the enemy's back.
Auto-Attack Damage to the enemy with Health less then 10% of Health Maximum increases damage of your next Ability.
All campfires have an invisibility detection effect within a 15-meter radius.
If the character's health drops below 15%, the hero becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. Can only activate once every 60 seconds.
Чемпион получает до 30% доп силы атаки, если у него малое количество ХП (меньше 50% от максимального значения)
Увеличивает ширину области поражения способности "Бросок Кинжала" на 0.1 метр.
Увеличивает базовый урон способности "Бросок Кинжала" на 60 единиц.
Получает два стака пассивки если попадает способностью.
Если способность поразила 3 цели, то Чемпион получает Бафф на усиление урона +30% на следующую способность q. Время Баффа 12 сек или по условию
Увеличение дальности применения способности на 0.5/1/1.5 метра
Увеличение радиуса работы способности на 0.25/0.5/0.75 метра
Усиливает эффект баффа на 5%/10% от максимального здоровья Чемпиона.
Увеличивает ширину зоны притягивания (прямоугольник) x+0,5, x +1, x+ 1,5
При нанесении урона по нескольким целям способность откатывается быстрее на 0.5 секунды за каждую пораженную цель (макс 3 сек)

Если Чемпион задевает противника способностью, то он получает бафф на одну автоатаку - часть урона следующей автоатаки нанесется в небольшое аое вокруг цели(сплэш). Чемпион получает по одному стаку баффа за каждую задетую цель. каждая автоатака будет снимать один стак.
Также аое оставляет воид зону, которая вешает на противников замедление и наносит урон в теч 5 сек.
В течение времени метки, на цели можно стакать пассивку больше 3х стаков, без ограничений. По окончанию действия метки на цели нельзя стакать пассивку, пока не спадет старая (с большими стаками)
Метка подсвечивает противника в тумане войны
Автоатаки по противнику под меткой дают Чемпиону кратковременный бафф на скорость передвижения на 1/1.5/2 сек
Переключение стоек дает Чемпиону кратковременный бафф на маг резист, армор и скорость передвижения.
Усиливает селфбафф на скорость передвижения и резисты
Способность также наносит урон и рутает противников в АОЕ вокруг цели. Зона поражения аое меньше чем у w способности в 1,5 раза.
Увеличивает длительность воид зоны на 1/2/3 сек
Увеличивает урон по доп целям во 2-й стойке на 5%/10%/15%
Increases the outgoing damage of character and nearby allies by 5%. (Works only if allies are nearby).
The character gains 5% damage reduction when no allies are nearby.
If there are no allies nearby, the character receives health regeneration equal to 0.5% of their maximum health per second for 20 seconds after exiting combat.
Healing and resource restoration received from consumables is increased by 20%, and their cooldown is reduced by 20%.
Upon killing an enemy, the character restores 3% of their maximum health and mana.
When using a alchemy consumables, gain a 10% damage boost and 10% damage reduction for 10 seconds.
When there are no allied character nearby, the character gains 5% increased damage.
After using a "campfire," the character receives a buff that increases the character's primary attribute by 10% (adaptive) for 5 minutes.
Create campfires with just two pieces of magic wood and no matches.
The character cannot be approached unnoticed, therefore all effects of attacks from behind and from invisibility do not work.
Able to detect wards. Activates once every 30 seconds.
Upon taking lethal damage, the character survives at 1 hp and granted a shield equal to 30% of their maximum health for 10 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 5 minutes.
When there are no allies nearby and the character's health drops below 80%/50%/20%, they gain +3/6/9% vampirism.
All positive effects 1 minute duration or more on the character stronger by 20% and last 40% longer.
Когда Здоровье опускается ниже 10% , Скорость передвижения увеличивается.
После 10 сек неподвижности на миникарте появляются отметки игроков и монстров.
Радиус действия : 25м Время действия: 5 сек Повторное использование: 10 сек
Shields applied by the character grant the target 10% Attack Speed for the shield's duration.
Character and nearby allies receive 5% reduced damage from all sources. (Works only if allies are nearby).
Character and nearby allies receive 5% movement speed. (Works only if allies are nearby).
Shields applied by the character grant the target 15 Armor (Bonus) or Magic Resist (Bonus) (adaptive) for the shield's duration.
If the character interrupts an enemy's ability, restores 5% maximum Mana to the ally with the lowest mana level.
Character's abilities apply a charge to the target. Upon reaching 3 charges, an auto-attack from an ally against the target will stun it for 2 second.

When the character hits a target with hard crowd control, after the effect expires, the target gets marked. An auto-attack from an ally against the marked target will heal the ally for 5% of their maximum Health.
Enemies affected by the character's movement-impairing abilities deal 15% reduced damage for the duration of the effect.
Grant character and nearby allies a 10% increase to their primary attribute. (Works only if allies are nearby).
All positive effects applied by the character with a duration of 1 minute or more become 15% stronger.
The player's wards last twice as long and reveal 50% more of the fog of war.
Damaging abilities apply a mark to enemies for 5 seconds, increasing their damage taken from all allies by 10%.
Direct damage abilities apply a mark to the enemy for 5 seconds. Damage dealt to the marked target grants the hero's allies vampirism equal to 5% of the damage dealt.
Using the ultimate ability grants character and nearby allies invulnerability for 2 second. (Works only if allies are nearby).
Аура повышающая параметры Сопротивление Физическому Урону и Сопротивление Магическому Урону у союзников.
Сопротивление Физическому Урону: +10% Сопротивление Магическому Урону: +10%
Нахождение игрока на одном месте в течении 10 секунд оставляют на невидимом юните Ауру (для всех), увеличивающую мейн стат на 10%. Если мейн статы равны, то рандом. Юнит живет 10сек. Cd = 20 сек
Increases damage depending on the distance to the target. Damage is increased by 1% for each unit, starting from 4 meters away.
Using Auto-Attacks or Abilities apply an Effect that increases Physical Damage.
Physical Damage: +15% Duration: 5 sec Cooldown: 20 sec
For each skill used, the character gains charges. Upon reaching 5 charges, the next skill will gain 3 meters to its range of application.
For each skill used, the character gains charges. Upon reaching 5 charges, the next skill will gain 3 meters to its range.
During the ability's duration, the Destroyer takes <w>20%</w> less damage.
When hit, the skill interrupts the cast.
Enemies affected by the ability experience a <w>20%</w> slowing effect.
The ability deals <w>25%</w> more damage to enemies with full HPMax.
For each target hit by the ability, the next attack of the Destroyer increases by <w>10%</w>. (Maximum <w>40%</w>).
If the Destroyer hits an opponent, the ability can be reused within 2 seconds. It performs a short lunge forward, dealing <pd>physical damage</pd> (<w>100%</w> AttackPower) in front of the character.
During the ability's duration, the Destroyer gains <w>50%</w> ressistance to slowing effects.
For each target hit by the ability, the Destroyer gains <w>+10%</w> MoveSpeedFinalKPositive.
Enemies damaged by the ability lose <w>5%</w> Armor for <w>3</w> seconds. The effect can stack up to 6 times.
Increases the duration of the ability by <w>3</w> seconds.
For each opponent hit by the ability, the Destroyer gains a charge for the passive skill (up to a maximum of <w>3</w> charges per strike).
+2% to damage in the outer radius zone.
For each opponent hit, the ability's cooldown is reduced by <w>1</w> second (maximum reduction - <w>3</w> seconds per single use of the ability).
+2% to damage in the outer radius zone.
Opponents in the center of the area will be stunned for <w>2</w> seconds.
The Destroyer restores HPMax equal to <w>10%</w> of the damage dealt when hitting opponents on the edge of the area of effect.
+2% to damage in the outer radius zone.

If the ability hits an enemy, it can be used again within <w>2</w> seconds. The Destroyer throws their weapon in the chosen direction, dealing <pd>physical damage</pd> (<w>100%</w> AttackPower) to the first enemy hit.
Increases the duration of the buff by <w>5</w> seconds.
Increases the bonus AttackPower and bonus HPMax gained by <w>5%</w>.
The ability becomes AoE: In the area of effect, enemies lose <w>15%</w> Armor and <w>15%</w> Resist.
The Destroyer becomes enraged and gains <w>10%</w> resistance to crowd control effects.
Removes all slowing effects. Nearby allies also gain the enhancement effects.
After landing, all enemies within <w>2</w> meters outside of the damage radius are knocked back and Destroyer receives <w>50%</w> SlowResistance for <w>3</w> seconds.
The ability is replaced with:The area of effect is expanded by <w>2</w> meters. The Destroyer pulls nearby enemies towards him, dealing <pd>physical damage</pd> and rooting them for <w>3</w> seconds.

When receiving lethal damage, the character has a 50% chance to avoid the attack. Additionally, the character regenerates 30% of their missing health over 10 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 5 minutes.
While under the effect of hard crowd control, the character restores 2% maximum health per second.

If the character's health falls below 20%, all damage taken in the next 5 seconds will be absorbed and dealt over 10 seconds as a damage-over-time effect. This effect can only occur once every 3 minutes.
If the ability charges expire, the Legionary restores <w>0.5%</w> of maximum HPMax per charge.
The Legionary gains <w>2</w> charges for a kill and <w>1</w> charge for assisting in a kill.
Abilities on hit now also grant <w>1</w> stack for passive ability.
When reaching the maximum number of charges, the Legionary gains a shield with a strength of <w>5%</w> of maximum HPMax + (<w>50%</w> (Armor + Resist)) for <w>5</w> seconds.

The Legionary can activate a special ability. The Legionary’s auto-attack range is increased by <w>6</w> meters when throwing spears. The duration of this effect is increased by <w>1</w> second for each charge of the special ability.
The ability slows down affected enemies by <w>20%</w>.
If the interrupt was successful, the Legionary restores MPMax to themselves in an amount equal to the interrupt ability's cost.
If the ability hits only one opponent, they are stunned for <w>2</w> seconds.
After using the ability, the Legionary gains a shield for <w>2</w> seconds that reflects the damage from the next incoming ability.

The ability can be reactivated within <w>2</w> seconds. The Legionary strikes the ground with their shield, creating a shockwave in the chosen direction that deals <md>magic damage</md> and knocks up all affected targets.
The Legionary throws an ally with precise balance, transferring the momentum of the throw to the ally. The ally's MoveSpeed is increased by <w>20%</w> for <w>3</w> seconds upon landing.
Enemies caught in the center of the affected area receive additional <md>magic damage</md> equal to <w>10%</w> of the thrown target's maximum HPMax.
The throwing radius is doubled if target’s maximum HPMax is less than <w>50%</w> of the Legionary's maximum HPMax.

After landing, the enemy's <armat>Armor</armat> and Resist are reduced by <w>2%</w> for each accumulated effect of the special ability. The debuff lasts for <w>3</w> seconds. After landing an ally, their <armi><armat>Armor</armat> and Resist are increased by <w>2%</w> for each accumulated effect of the special ability. The buff lasts for <w>3</w> seconds.
The ability can be reactivated within <w>2</w> seconds: The Legionary makes a dash towards the thrown target.
Increases the damage dealt to the first affected target by <w>15%</w>.
The ability ignores <w>20%</w> of the enemy's Armor.
When the ability is on cooldown, Legionary's basic attacks deal additional <pd>physical damage</pd> (<w>20%</w> Armor).

If the ability hits an enemy, it can be reactivated. The Legionary performs a spear lunge, dealing <w>70</w> - <w>250</w> (depending on hero level) (AttackPower) <pd>physical damage</pd>. For each charge of the special ability, the lunge ignores 2% of the enemy's Armor.

The Legionary takes less damage. Each charge of the special ability reduces incoming damage by <w>3%</w>. Additionaly Legionary can target an ally when using ultimate ablility and redirect <w>50%</w> incoming damage to this ally to him self for the duration of the ultimate ability. Can retarget protection by pressing R. The duration of the effect is increased by <w>0.5</w> seconds for each charge of the special ability.

Using the ability removes all negative effects from the Legionary, rendering them immune to all crowd control effects and increasing the bonus attack damage gained from Armor and Resist by up to <w>50%</w>. The duration of the effect is increased by <w>0.5</w> seconds for each charge of the special ability.
Activating one of the modes increases the Blast Medic's MoveSpeedFinalKPositive by <w>20%</w> for <w>3</w> seconds.
Activating a mode causes an energy burst and reduces the Blast Medic's aggro by <w>10%</w>.
When selecting a mode, there is a <w>10%</w> chance of a malfunction. The glitch causes all <w>3</w> modes to be activated simultaneously.
Increases healing and damage effects by <w>10%</w> and grants an additional auto-attack.

The ability can be used again within <w>2</w> seconds. The mode that was last selected will be chosen automatically. The cost of reusing the ability is <w>20%</w> of the current MPMax pool, but not less than <w>20</w> MPMax.
Blast Medic can move while using this skill, but MoveSpeedFinalKPositive is reduced by <w>30%</w>.
Increases the ricochet range to the next target by <w>1</w> meter.

Each ricochet attaches a mine to the enemy for <w>5</w> seconds, which activates <w>2</w> seconds after the ricochet. The mine will detonate on the enemy if the Blast Medic shoots it with an auto-attack, dealing <md>magical damage</md> (<w>50%</w> SpellPower). The detonation will fear the target for <w>2</w> seconds. The mine can be dispelled.

Each ricochet attaches a mine to an ally for <w>5</w> seconds, which activates <w>2</w> seconds after the last ricochet. The Blast Medic can reuse the ability to activate a <shield>shield</shield> on allies (<w>300%</w> HLPower) that absorbs damage for <w>5</w> seconds. The mine can be dispelled.
While the shield from this ability is active, the target receives a <w>30%</w> reduction in slowing effects.
Reduces Armor / Resist of enemies hit by the explosion by <w>20%</w> for <w>5</w> seconds.
The blast radius is increased, and damage and shield effects are enhanced by <w>20%</w> at the center of the area.

After exploding, the bomb turns into a smoke bomb, dispersing a thick smoke cloud in the blast area for <w>5</w> seconds. The Blast Medic is invisible to enemies while in this cloud. If an enemy enters the smoke cloud, they will see the Bomber and can attack him.
When the clone hits enemies, the Blast Medic restores <w>5%</w> + (<w>1%</w> for every <w>20</w> HLPower) health.
At the moment of teleportation, a blast occurs at the clone's location, dealing <md>magical damage</md> equal to <w>100%</w> SpellPower.
When the Blast Medic teleports through an enemy, the enemy is stunned for <w>2</w> seconds.
The Blast Medic can control their clone. You can automatically teleport by using Shift +E.
Can re-use the ability within <w>2</w> seconds to swap places with the clone back.

- Removes all crowd control effects from an ally. - While the Blast Medic is under the shield, he regenerates health at <w>2%</w> of maximum HPMax per second. - While the enemy is under the drone's effect, they take <w>15%</w> more incoming damage.

The Blast Medic throws a drone at the target, dealing damage (<w>150%</w> AttackPower and <w>150%</w> SpellPower) and causing fear for <w>2</w> seconds. After the debuff expires, the drone detonates (radius <w>2</w>m), dealing damage (<w>150%</w> AttackPower and <w>150%</w> SpellPower) and causing fear for <w>2</w> seconds to all enemies within the explosion radius.

The Ranger uses acid arrows and leaves an acidic cloud in the area of effect for <w>5</w> seconds. Enemies within the area receive magic damage over time (<w>100%</w> SpellPower) each second. If the acidic cloud connects with fire the area will explode for (<w>100%</w> SpellPower) <md>magic damage</md>.

Each character's healing or shielding used on the same target increases the healing and shielding used on that same target by 5%. The effect stacks up to 5 times and lasts for 15 seconds. If an ability is used on a different target, the buff expires.
Healing an ally increases the effectiveness of next damaging ability by 15%. Damaging an enemy with ability increases the effectiveness of next healing ability by 15%
Using the ultimate ability reduces the cost of healing abilities by 90% for 20 seconds.
The net becomes denser and restricts movements. For those affected by the skill, AttackSpeed is reduced by <w>50%</w>, and the casting speed of abilities is also decreased by <w>50%</w>.
If the ability affects an opponent who is under the acceleration buff or flying, the target receives double damage.
The net becomes acidic, during the immobilization effect, the target's Armor and Resist are reduced by <w>5%</w> each second for <w>5</w> seconds.
The ability also immobilizes one additional enemy located <w>3</w> meters behind the primary target.

If the ability immobilizes an opponent, the skill can be reused - the Ranger releases a fiery arrow in the specified direction. The arrow deals <pd>physical damage</pd> (<w>100%</w> AttackPower) and ignites the target it hits applying <md>magic damage</md> over time <w>10</w>/<w>20</w>/<w>30</w>/<w>40</w>/<w>50</w>+ (<w>70%</w> SpellPower) for <w>3</w> seconds. Enemies immobilized by the ability are ignited for <w>6</w> seconds, but the root effect fades after <w>0.5</w> sec.
The Ability now applies <w>1</w> arrow for The Ranger’s passive ability to all enemies affected.
The radius of the ability is increased by <w>1</w> meter and deals <w>20%</w> more damage in the center of the effect.
Enemies within the area of effect are unable to use dash abilities.
While the Ranger is in the standard stance, he ignores <w>2%</w> of the target's Armor for each lodged arrow.
While the Ranger is in the barrage stance, additional targets recieve <w>75%</w> damage.
Upon switching to the standard stance, the next auto-attack disarms the target for <w>2</w> seconds. Upon switching to the barrage stance, the next auto-attack knocks back enemies by <w>2</w> meters.
Every 5th shot deals <w>5%</w> of the opponent's current HPMax as <md>magic damage</md>.

The Ranger coats the arrow with poison over <w>1.5</w> seconds (shift E) and can be cast while moving. After the arrow is coated, the Ranger can release the arrow in the desired direction within <w>3</w> seconds. The poison arrow deals <pd>physical damage</pd> (<w>100%</w> AttackPower) and applies a poison effect to the target it hits, dealing <md>magic damage</md> over time (<w>10</w>/<w>20</w>/<w>30</w>/<w>40</w>/<w>50</w> + <w>70%</w> SpellPower) for <w>3</w> seconds. If the poison arrow hits an acidic net, the effect of the acidic net is doubled. If the poison arrow hits an acidic cloud, the effect and duration of the acidic cloud are doubled.
The Ranger moves <w>15%</w> faster when moving towards a target with <w>5</w> or more arrows.
Increases the chance a target will be hit by an additional arrow by <w>10%</w>.
Upon activating the ability, the Ranger restores <w>0.5%</w> of his maximum HPMax for each arrow.
If a target has the maximum amount of arrows stacked, they will slowly drain <w>1</w> mana per arrow per second.
At <w>6</w> stacks of the special ability, the archer's auto-attacks deal additional <md>magic damage</md> (<w>15%</w> SpellPower).

A shot with fiery arrows. At the landing point of the arrows (at the end of the cone), a fiery wall appears. Enemies passing through it take <md>magical damage</md> (<w>40%</w> SpellPower) each second and ignite, receiving magical damage over time (<w>100%</w> SpellPower) for <w>5</w> seconds.

After a successful rebound, the ability can be activated again. The Ranger performs a powerful fire shot in the specified direction. The shot deals <pd>physical damage</pd> (<w>140%</w> AttackPower) to the first target hit and leaves behind <w>3</w> charges of the passive ability.
Shaman's Leap disrupts the target's balance and interrupts ability usage.
After the leap, the shaman harnesses the movement impulse, granting the next <w>4</w> auto-attacks <w>100%</w> increased AttackSpeed.
The shaman is able to jump to allied targets.
The shaman plunges his knuckles into an enemy target, leaving gaping wounds that deal periodic <pd>physical damage</pd> equal to <w>100%</w> AttackPower over <w>5</w> seconds.
The shaman can use the ability again within <w>1</w> second after the leap to roll behind the enemy.
The first target hit by the lightning is knocked back <w>1</w> meter.
If the ability deals critical damage, it leaves electric charges on the target, inflicting periodic <md>magical damage</md> equal to <w>50%</w> SpellPower over <w>5</w> seconds.

The shaman delves deeper into the knowledge of the air element, making his lightning more destructive. The lightning turns into a chain lightning that strikes up to <w>4</w> targets, with each next target receiving <w>50%</w> less damage.
The lightning can bounce between the same targets if no other targets are available.
The AttackSpeed buff lasts for <w>15</w> seconds.
Rip Apart and Lightning Strike can apply a charge of the special ability.
Each stack adds +<w>1</w> meter range to Rip Apart and Lightning Strike.
There is a <w>20%</w> chance to stack <w>2</w> charges at once instead of one when gaining charges.

Fire Element - Knuckles ignite, causing the shaman to deal additional <md>magical damage</md> with auto-attacks (<w>20%</w> SpellPower). Water Element - Restores MPMax with auto-attacks (<w>2%</w> of damage dealt). Earth Element - Skin hardens, reducing enemy auto-attack damage by <w>15%</w>.
Increases the totem's effective radius by <w>30%</w>.
Increases the totem's duration by <w>5</w> seconds.
The shaman's totems become sturdier and gain <w>+2</w> HPMax.
There is a <w>10%</w> chance that the totem won't consume a stack.
Healing Totem - Cleanses one debuff from the shaman or an ally every <w>5</w> seconds. Fire Totem - Attacks <w>2</w> targets simultaneously. Wolf Totem - Reduces enemy MoveSpeed by <w>20%</w>.

The spirit of the wolf inhabits the shaman, enhancing his abilities. • Rip Apart - Empowers the next auto-attack within <w>2</w> seconds. • Totemic Fury - The shaman gains <w>+100%</w> to the skill's passive buffs. • Lightning Strike - No cooldown. Consumes <w>10</w> MPMax per second. Press Shift+R.

The summoned wolf receives <w>10%</w> + (<w>1%</w> for every <w>25</w> SpellPower) of the shaman's stats. It increases in size and generates increased threat with its attacks. When recast on a friendly target, the wolf establishes a spiritual bond with them. Gains the Claw Strike ability (recast the skill on an enemy, costs <w>75</w> MPMax), which hits in a cone in front of it, dealing (<w>40</w>/<w>80</w>/<w>120</w>/<w>160</w>/<w>200</w>) + (<w>40%</w>/<w>60%</w>/<w>70%</w>/<w>80%</w>/<w>90%</w>) AttackPower and provoking affected enemies to attack it for 1 second while healing the bonded ally for (<w>30%</w> of damage dealt + <w>50%</w> HLPower). Cooldown is <w>15</w> seconds. Consumes <w>10</w> MPMax per second. Press Shift+R.
MoveSpeedFinalKPositive in camouflage is increased by <w>20%</w>.
When leaving invisibility, AttackSpeed is increased by <w>20%</w> for <w>4</w> seconds.
The new generation camouflage device allows for instant invisibility.
Upgraded camouflage enables you to sneak closer to enemies.
The Infiltrator has learned the Ambush skill. While in camouflage, the Infiltrator can deliver a powerful strike to an enemy. This attack always deals critical damage.
If the mine lands on an enemy, they will be stunned for <w>2</w> seconds.
The Infiltrator uses an advanced version of the mine with a flash effect. Enemies caught in the blast radius are also blinded for <w>2</w> seconds.
Up to <w>3</w> mines can be active simultaneously.
The Infiltrator can throw a mine from stealth without breaking it.

Press Shift+R to cause mines within a <w>14</w>-meter radius to rise into the air (<w>0.3</w> seconds) and explode, doubling their blast radius. When hit by more than one mine, only <w>25%</w> of the damage from each additional mine is counted.
MoveSpeedFinalKPositive increases by <w>20%</w> towards the rooted target. Activates from <w>2</w> meters and farther.
While the target is rooted, its defense stats are reduced by <w>30%</w>.
The Infiltrator grenade cluster now has twice as many grenades. (Blast radius increased by <w>1</w> meter)
After the explosion, a electric zone remains, dealing damage every second equivalent to <w>30%</w> of SpellPower to all enemies within it for <w>5</w> seconds.
If a healing or shield spell is applied to the rooted target, the caster will be rooted for <w>2</w> seconds, silenced for <w>5</w> seconds, and their ability's will be interupted.
The Infiltrator poisons the daggers before throwing, causing enemies to take additional damage equal to <w>20%</w> SpellPower over <w>7</w> seconds. This effect can stack.
If the dagger hits from behind, the damage will always be critical.
For each dagger that hits the target, the Infiltrator gains a <w>10%</w> MoveSpeed increase for <w>5</w> seconds.
If both daggers hit one target, the Infiltrator starts to drain life from the target through his daggers, draining 2% of the target's maximum Health each second.

Recast T: With shadow chains, the Infiltrator pulls his daggers back from the victim, dealing <w>60%</w> SpellPower damage for each dagger and causing a Bleed effect that deals <w>30%</w> AttackPower damage per second for <w>5</w> seconds. Additionally, it removes any disarm effect from the Bomber.

The Infiltrator shadow steps behind the enemy and delivers a dual dagger strike that deals (100%)AttackPower. The skill has <w>3</w> charges. If the target's HPMax is at <w>20%</w> or below, the Infiltrator deals <w>20%</w> more damage.
After using the ultimate ability, if the skill hasn't recharged, the Infiltrator can enter stealth for <w>7</w> seconds within the next <w>2</w> seconds. This removes all aggro.
